content: Please proceed with your question. Please proceed with your question. So Itay, learning is -- when we think about the $290 million, really, that's being driven in the short term really by higher energy utility, including freight type costs. So full year, we're talking in the range of $565 million 2021 to 2022 impact of higher input costs, whether it's labor. Please proceed with your question. Please proceed with your question. Please proceed with your question. Please proceed with your question. Please proceed with your question. Please proceed with your question. But it just doesn't stop there like we did in -- over the last two years, when there is an industry-wide variable like we're talking, whether it's commodity or freight or inflation, we as a management team, with all the group leadership and Magna leadership, go through this on a monthly basis at the minimum. Please proceed with your question.
